description: Locate and list ISO images within the file system
name: Locate images on file system

options.description: > Choose starting location to search for .iso and .ova files
options.label: Location to start looking for files
options.name: local-path

options.description: > Simply displays the existing ISO files. Will be updated after each run.
options.label: Detected ISO files
options.name: image-files-iso

options.description: > Simply displays the existing OVA/OVF files. Will be updated after each run.
options.label: Detected OVA/OVF files
options.name: image-files-ova

options.description: > Simply displays the existing .bin files. Will be updated after each run.
options.label: Detected executable files
options.name: image-files-bin

options.description: > Simply displays the existing .tar.gz files. Will be updated after each run.
options.label: CNC Installation files
options.name: install-files

options.description: > Simply displays the existing .tar.gz files. Will be updated after each run.
options.label: CNC patches
options.name: cnc-patches
